data.title: STEM recruitment talent partner
data.meta_description: SThree is the global STEM-specialist recruitment partner that connects sought-after specialists in life sciences, technology, engineering and data analytics with dynamic organisations across the globe.
data.text:
Igniting careers

Operating through a global house of specialist recruitment brands our consultants understand your needs, matching sought-after skills with dynamic organisations, game-changers with change-makers. Supercharging the careers of highly skilled people is at the core of our mission, helping them do the work they aspire to do - contract or permanent.

Building the future

By challenging experts with unexpected roles that match their goals, we push boundaries and spark possibilities. As the global STEM-specialist talent partner we use our network of experts to help organisations innovate and grow while adapting to new ways of working.

Seek sought-after specialists

Draw on our global network to recruit the best professionals and find the skills you need tomorrow, today.

Join our global team

Impact people’s lives by finding them rewarding roles, guiding them to explore new opportunities and changing lives for the better.

In this interview with SThree, Professor Ajunwa delves into various use cases of AI in recruitment.

SThree is delighted to announce the appointment of Matt McManus as its new President based in Houston Texas.
